sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>inactive</active> <available_version>0.0.1</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.snc.cti" name="CTI Softphone" version="0.0.1" invalidate_properties="true" provider_name="ServiceNow" cache_flush="true" state="published" type="application" licensable="true" help="CSHelp:Customer-Service-Management-CTI-Overview"> <requires> <import plugin="com.snc.matching_rule"/> <import plugin="com.sn_openframe"/> <import plugin="com.snc.notify"/> <import plugin="com.snc.notify.twilio"/> </requires> <description>Enables Twilio integration using Notify and OpenFrame to provide softphone functions and call center capabilities. These include make, receive phone calls, transfer, hold and mute. Applications like Customer Service and Incident Management provide demo workflows for CTI. Please re-activate respective applications where you require CTI demo workflows. </description> </plugin> ]]></definition> <description>Enables Twilio integration using Notify and OpenFrame to provide softphone functions and call center capabilities. These include make, receive phone calls, transfer, hold and mute. Applications like Customer Service and Incident Management provide demo workflows for CTI. Please re-activate respective applications where you require CTI demo workflows.</description> <has_demo_data>true</has_demo_data> <help>http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=CSHelp:Customer-Service-Management-CTI-Overview</help> <id>com.snc.cti</id> <licensable>true</licensable> <name>CTI Softphone</name> <path>plugin://com.snc.cti/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.snc.matching_rule,com.sn_openframe,com.snc.notify,com.snc.notify.twilio</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.snc.cti</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>true</trackable> <type>application</type> <version>0.0.1</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
